headline: Is Invitation Homes (INVH) Starting To Look Attractive After A 18% One Year Share Price Drop
summary: If you are wondering whether Invitation Homes is starting to look attractively priced, this article will walk you through what the current share price might be implying about its value. The stock last closed at US$26.30, with returns of 2.4% over the past week, a 1.8% decline over the past month, a 5.1% decline year to date, and an 18.0% decline over the past year. The 5 year return sits at 7.2% and the 3 year return at a 4.7% decline. Recent pricing moves are sitting against a backdrop of...
